comment.text: May play a role in the regulation of pre-mRNA splicing.
Limited to cell-lines of leukemic origin.
Broadly expressed during the 11th week of gestation, with highest levels in the central nervous system, spinal ganglia, osteoblasts and osteocytes (at protein level).

property.value: Expressed in left testis and 237 other tissues
